title: Booluee Creative Anchor Bookmark Metal Bookmark Page Holder Book Holder for Reading Hands Free, 1 Pack (Rose Gold)
features: -Anchor page holder is made of quality zinc alloy, durable and beautiful, smooth to the touch
-Easy to use, just slip the metal prongs into the top of your book to show the page you want to keep open, and it will stay open
-The anchor design of the metal bookmark is cute and creative, will cultivate children's reading hobby and increase reading enjoyment
-A small but exquisite decoration for the books, suitable for teachers, students, writers or other reading lovers, it will be a smart choice as a graduation gift

-Suitable for most sizes of books, such as magazines, brochures, music books, manuals, textbooks, etc. You can do your own things, play musical instruments, make notes, teach or other things at the same time
description: This anchor page holder is made of high quality zinc alloy, featuring with chrome painted finishing, hand welding, smooth surface, solid and durable. Hold your book open flat without tearing it. Metal anchor is a page holder that holds-book-open for hands free reading, also works as a premium-grade metal bookmarks. Functional way like a page-holder yet having an elegant shape, meanwhile it will elevates the experience of reading!

The anchor clip can be micro adjusted but please don't move too hard, do it slowly and gently; Pointed parts, please remember to stay away from little children! Because of the different displays, actual color may vary slightly from image.
